text: Rossford is a city in Wood County, Ohio, United States, located along the Maumee River in the Toledo metropolitan area. 6,299 people lived there at the 2020 census. It is in western Ohio. Rossford is a major transport hub as 80/90 intersect 75 here. I-80 goes from San Francisco to almost New York City. I-90 goes from Seattle to Boston. I-75 goes from Miami to the Canadian border. 80/90 are concurrent from Lake Station, Indiana to Elyria, Ohio. Category:Cities in Ohio
title: Rossford, Ohio
